title: Data Use Certificates
markdown:
Completion of a Data Use Certificate is required to access several studies within the AMP-AD Knowledge Portal.
View controlled access studies Study Abbreviation | Study Name | Required DUC --- | --- | --- CHDWB| The Center for Health Discovery and Well Being Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC DiCAD| The DiCAD study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MayoLOADGWAS| The Mayo Clinic LOAD Genome-Wide Association and Brain Gene Expression Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MayoRNAseq| The Mayo RNAseq Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MC-CAA| The Mayo Clinic AD-CAA RNA-Seq Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MSBB| The Mount Sinai Brain Bank Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC rnaSeqReprocessing| The RNAseq Reprocessing Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC ROSMAP| The Religious Orders Study and Memory and Aging Project Study | ROSMAP DUC
##To submit a new DUC you will need to complete the following steps:
  1. Write a description of your proposed research (1-3 paragraphs in English).
  2. Visit the online Data Access request tool for AMP-AD Knowledge Portal or ROSMAP, where you can download and print the DUC form.
    3. Which DUC form do I need? Study Abbreviation | Study Name | Required DUC --- | --- | --- CHDWB| The Center for Health Discovery and Well Being Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC DiCAD| The DiCAD study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MayoLOADGWAS| The Mayo Clinic LOAD Genome-Wide Association and Brain Gene Expression Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MayoRNAseq| The Mayo RNAseq Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MC-CAA| The Mayo Clinic AD-CAA RNA-Seq Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC MSBB| The Mount Sinai Brain Bank Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC rnaSeqReprocessing| The RNAseq Reprocessing Study | AMP-AD Knowledge Portal DUC ROSMAP| The Religious Orders Study and Memory and Aging Project Study | ROSMAP DUC
  3. Gather Synapse usernames and signatures from all the team members at your institution who will need access to the data.
  4. Have an official at your institution review and sign the DUC. Note that no changes are allowed to the text of the DUC.
    5. Learn more A signing official is someone from your organization who can speak to your affiliation and good standing within the organization. Note that you cannot serve as your own signing official.
  5. Scan the completed DUC.
  6. Complete the online Data Access request process for AMP-AD Knowledge Portal or ROSMAP, which includes submitting the proposed research description ("Intended Data Use Statement") and uploading the signed DUC form.
    Expected turnaround is within one week of DUC submission. Once approved, data may be downloaded and accessed for one year. ##To add new team members to an existing DUC you will need to complete the following steps:
  1. Visit the AMP-AD Knowledge Portal or ROSMAP DUC page.
  2. Select "Update Request".
  3. Download the existing DUC form
  4. Gather Synapse usernames and signatures from all the new team members at your institution who will need access to the data.
  5. Scan the completed DUC.
  6. Complete the online DUC request process for AMP-AD Knowledge Portal or ROSMAP.
    Expected turnaround is within one week of DUC submission. Once approved, data may be downloaded and accessed for one year.
